message.entry: Specify a color array as an m-by-3 RGB matrix or an m-by-n-by-3 truecolor array.

Invalid LCH values. Specify an m-by-3 matrix with columns for lightness, chroma, and hue, respectively. Specify lightness values in the range [0, 1], chroma as nonnegative values, and hue as angle values in degrees.
